title: Epps alphabet
content:
Hi all,   
   
Can anyone tell me of a site where I can look at the Evans and Epps alphabet?   
It seems to have fallen by the wayside now, but from memory it would have been an ideal font for 7-segment LED displays as used in electronic equipment.   
   
Cheers,   
Bob Siegel
author: anonymous

comments.content:
To Martin Fredrikson,   
   
That was great.   
Thanks for your help.   
   
Cheers,   
Bob Siegel
